mapper.insert: insert into #{questionId}_question_answer(uid, questionId, content, agree, comment, collection, createDate) values(#{uid}, #{questionId}, #{content}, #{agree}, #{comment}, #{collection}, #{createDate})
mapper.update: create table #{questionId}_#{id}_answer_comment(id int(20) auto_increment primary key, uid int(20), content varchar(200), agree int(20), toWho int(20), createDate date)
mapper.select: select * from #{questionId}_question_answer where uid=#{uid} and content=#{content}
